expression-projection.text: CAST(c AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS DATETIME)

function.text: CAST(c AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS DATETIME)

expression-projection.text: CAST(MULTISET(SELECT cust_address FROM customers c WHERE c.customer_id = cd.customer_id) as cust_address_tab_typ)

function.text: CAST(MULTISET(SELECT cust_address FROM customers c WHERE c.customer_id = cd.customer_id) as cust_address_tab_typ)

table-function.text: OPENJSON(@array) WITH ( month VARCHAR(3), temp int, month_id tinyint '$.sql:identity()')

expression-projection.text: SalesQuota - FIRST_VALUE(SalesQuota) OVER (PARTITION BY BusinessEntityID, YEAR(QuotaDate) ORDER BY DATEPART(QUARTER, QuotaDate))

function.text: FIRST_VALUE(SalesQuota) OVER (PARTITION BY BusinessEntityID, YEAR(QuotaDate) ORDER BY DATEPART(QUARTER, QuotaDate))

expression-projection.text: SalesQuota - LAST_VALUE(SalesQuota) OVER (PARTITION BY BusinessEntityID, YEAR(QuotaDate) ORDER BY DATEPART(QUARTER, QuotaDate) RANGE BETWEEN CURRENT ROW AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)

function.text: LAST_VALUE(SalesQuota) OVER (PARTITION BY BusinessEntityID, YEAR(QuotaDate) ORDER BY DATEPART(QUARTER, QuotaDate) RANGE BETWEEN CURRENT ROW AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
